==== Component: richtipi (type: tipi) ====
 [[..componentlist|(Back to componentlist)]]
=== Values === 
  *[[tipidoc:TipiEcho:types:color|color]] : background (writable) 
  *[[tipidoc:TipiEcho:types:color|color]] : foreground (writable) 
  *[[tipidoc:TipiEcho:types:border|border]] : border (writable) 
  *[[tipidoc:Tipi:types:float|float]] : opacity (writable) 
  *[[tipidoc:Tipi:types:float|float]] : bordersize (writable) 
  *[[tipidoc:Tipi:types:integer|integer]] : arc (writable)

== Event: onLoad ==
